Name: Monochro
About the game: Monochro is an action-platformer game about a person who explores the colorful world. Use the unique weapons carried by balloons and the air-dash to reach the end of the world. Key Features: Unique Weapons Annihilate all enemies with weapons, sword, shotgun, missile and so on. Rank Up Players will obtain EXP in battle and gain player rank. When the player rank up, they get an upgrade or a heart. Randomly Generated World Each level is procedurally generated each time. Update log v1.1.1 Changed some effects Adjusted wall kick (Japanese text only) Changed the text of thunderbolt v1.1.0 Added easy mode v1.0.2 Added thunderbolt effect Fixed bug of XInput controller v1.0.1 Improved some weapons Changed weapon icon graphics Adjusted balloons Adjusted player attack movement
